schema.description: Sends NFTs to a new auction with the given parameters. Auction info can be modified before it has started but is immutable after that.

start_time.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch
start_time.title: Start time

items.description: Enter the address of (1) recipient. Click the '+ADD ITEM' button to add another. Ensure you're targeting the correct chain.

schema.title: Cw721 start auction

coin_denom.ui:title: Coin Denomination
coin_denom.ui:description: e.g, The denomination of the coin which auction bids should be placed in.
coin_denom.ui:help: Should be micro units (therefore lowercase and preceeded by a 'u', such as 'uandr' instead of 'andr'.

duration.ui:title: Auction Duration
duration.ui:description: Click in the field to choose the amount of time the auction will run for.
duration.ui:help: The value will be declared in milliseconds.

min_bid.ui:title: Minimum Bid
min_bid.ui:description: The initial starting bid amount which must be met in order for the auction to close successfully.
min_bid.ui:help: Should be numeric only. The value will be based on the declared denomination (which is in micro-units)

start_time.ui:title: Auction Start Time
start_time.ui:description: Click in the field to choose the start time and date for your auction.
start_time.ui:help: The value will appear in milliseconds since the epoch.

ui:options.title: Whitelist
ui:options.description: List of addresses that are allowed to participate in the auction.
